name: Yummy Combat Mania
description:
Play almost 150 pleasantly yummy puzzle levels and start a sugary and delicious adventure inYummy Combat Mania!
How to play to Yummy Combat Mania!

- Switch and match 3 or more cute candies
- Collect candies, and complete level targets
- Eye-catching and adorable candy graphics with glamour and charm
- FREE and FUN for everyone
